page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: {SURF SPORTS. The beaches of the area attract devotees of surf sports - both for windsurfing and boards. The Harlyn Rescue Surf Lifesaving Club provides recreation for its members, plus lifesaving facilities for other users of the beach. There are also life- guard facilities at Booby's Bay. {CAMPING and CARAVANS. Pitches for tents and touring caravans, also letting caravans are available at Harlyn Bay and Mother Ivey's Caravan and Camping Parks. {GOLF. }Trevose Golf Club offers facilities to residents and visitors. {HOLIDAY ACCOMMODATION. }Houses, bung- alows, chalets, flats and flatlets are all available for rental in the area.
